overview: Sam (David Zellner) runs into Lacey (Stephanie Wilson) walking her dog in the park. She doesnâ€™t seem too thrilled to see him. But he is really, really thrilled to see Choo-Choo. The dog used to be his and he is less-than-thrilled to learn that Lacey has since re-named the dog Rummy. This fateful first encounter (after a break-up three years ago) triggers a rapid escalation of tensions in this typically funny and bizarre early Zellner tale.
tagline: breakups are hard, but breaking windows can be harder.
title: Rummy
